decks.notes: This Jeskai Control deck aims to dominate the game by neutralizing threats with a mix of counterspells and removal spells while establishing a strong board presence with powerful dragons like Goldspan Dragon and Hinata, Dawn-Crowned. The deck also uses card draw spells like Expressive Iteration and Magma Opus to maintain a steady flow of resources. By controlling the game and out-valuing the opponent, this deck can effectively dictate the pace of the match and eventually overwhelm the opponent with its powerful creatures and spells.
